name: 林懷恩
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。導論、基本電量、簡單電阻電路、電阻與電阻串並聯電路、分壓及分流定理、直流電阻電路分析、網路定理、導體與絕緣體、電容器與 RC 電路、電感器與 RL 電路、交流電壓與電流、相量、基本交流電路、交流穩態分析、交流網路理論、交流電路中的功率
Introduction of basic charge, resistance, simple resistance circuit, resistor and resistor series parallel circuit, partial pressure and shunt theorem, DC resistance circuit analysis, network theorem, conductors and insulators, capacitors and RC circuits, inductors and RL circuits, AC voltage and current, Phasor, Basic AC Circuit, AC steady state analysis, AC network theory, The power in the AC circuit
